abilities.name: Plasma Cannon
abilities.description: Fires a high-energy plasma bolt that incinerates targets on impact.

abilities.name: Cybernetic Punch
abilities.description: Delivers a powerful servo-driven punch, crushing armor with hydraulic force.

abilities.name: Fusion Kick
abilities.description: Executes a high-impact kick with an energized leg actuator, knocking enemies back.

abilities.name: Stealth Cloak
abilities.description: Activates a cloaking device, rendering the Transformer invisible for a short duration.

abilities.name: Flip Kick
abilities.description: Performs an acrobatic flip kick, striking multiple enemies with a spinning, energized strike.

abilities.name: Overdrive Boost
abilities.description: Activates a temporary power surge, increasing attack speed and damage output.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of homing rockets that track multiple targets.

abilities.name: Backhand Spin
abilities.description: Spins with a backhand strike, using reinforced alloy arms to deliver a wide-area melee blow.

abilities.name: Repair Nanites
abilities.description: Deploys nanites to repair internal systems, restoring health over time.
